SOCOVESA.SN.summary: Socovesa S.A. engages in the real estate development, and engineering and construction business in Chile. The company's construction projects include houses, buildings, bridges, roads, trams, irrigation works, tunnels, ports, airports, and land projects; and offers real estate consultancy services. It offers its services under the Socovesa, Almagro, and Pilares brands. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Providencia, Chile.
